meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Point</kanji> <kanji>drip</kanji>s are drips coming down little by little. These are the drips of an <vocabulary>intravenous drip</vocabulary>. 

Back in the day this was a way of talking about raindrops, or really any falling drops of water. But nowadays we only use it for <vocabulary>IV drip</vocabulary>s.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
